Wellen -- a framework for exploring and teaching generative music making and algorithmic compositions

Package wellen

Class Note

java.lang.Object
wellen.Note
All Implemented Interfaces:
MIDI
public abstract class Note extends Object implements MIDI
supplies a series of note constants and methods to convert note values to frequencies and vice versa.
